00044 #include "c6x.h"
00045 #include "zgemmKernel.h"
00046 
00047 #include "stdio.h"
00048 void zgemmKernel(const doublecomplex *pA, const doublecomplex *pB, doublecomplex *pC, const doublecomplex a, const int k, const int stepC)
00049 {
00050   double * restrict ptrA = (double *) pA;
00051   double * restrict ptrB = (double *) pB;
00052   double * restrict ptrC = (double *) pC;
00053   double sum00r, sum00i;
00054   int index;
00055   int kEven = k&0xFFFE;
00056 
00057   sum00r = 0.0;
00058   sum00i = 0.0;
00059 
00060   if(k>4) // The loop is safe for k > 4
00061   {
00062 #pragma UNROLL(2)
00063     for(index = 0; index<kEven; index++)
00064     { // loop over k;
00065           // each iteration performs rank one update of 1x1 by 1x1
00066           // matrices of A and B respectively; result is
00067           // accumulated over 1x1 matrix
00068           double a0r, a0i;
00069           double b0r, b0i;
00070 
00071           a0r = *ptrA++;
00072           a0i = *ptrA++;
00073 
00074           b0r = *ptrB++;
00075           b0i = *ptrB++;
00076 
00077           sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00078           sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00079           sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00080           sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00081 
00082     }
00083     if(k&1) // odd k; one left to do
00084     {
00085           double a0r, a0i;
00086           double b0r, b0i;
00087 
00088           a0r = *ptrA++;
00089           a0i = *ptrA++;
00090 
00091           b0r = *ptrB++;
00092           b0i = *ptrB++;
00093 
00094           sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00095           sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00096           sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00097           sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00098     }
00099   }
00100   else
00101   {
00102     if(k>0)
00103     { double a0r, a0i;
00104           double b0r, b0i;
00105 
00106           a0r = *ptrA++;
00107           a0i = *ptrA++;
00108 
00109           b0r = *ptrB++;
00110           b0i = *ptrB++;
00111 
00112           sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00113           sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00114           sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00115           sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00116     }
00117     if(k>1)
00118     { double a0r, a0i;
00119           double b0r, b0i;
00120 
00121           a0r = *ptrA++;
00122           a0i = *ptrA++;
00123 
00124           b0r = *ptrB++;
00125           b0i = *ptrB++;
00126 
00127           sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00128           sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00129           sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00130           sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00131     }
00132     if(k>2)
00133     { double a0r, a0i;
00134           double b0r, b0i;
00135 
00136           a0r = *ptrA++;
00137           a0i = *ptrA++;
00138 
00139           b0r = *ptrB++;
00140           b0i = *ptrB++;
00141 
00142           sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00143           sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00144           sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00145           sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00146     }
00147     if(k>3)
00148     { double a0r, a0i;
00149           double b0r, b0i;
00150 
00151           a0r = *ptrA++;
00152           a0i = *ptrA++;
00153 
00154           b0r = *ptrB++;
00155           b0i = *ptrB++;
00156 
00157           sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00158           sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00159           sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00160           sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00161     }
00162 
00163   }
00164 
00165   {  // final saving
00166         double ar, ai;
00167         ar = a.r;
00168         ai = a.i;
00169 
00170         *ptrC++ = (ar * sum00r - ai * sum00i) + (*ptrC);
00171         *ptrC   = (ar * sum00i + ai * sum00r) + (*ptrC);
00172   }
00173 
00174   return;
00175 } // zgemmKernel()
00176 
00177 void zgemmKernelFlexSave(const doublecomplex *pA, const doublecomplex *pB, doublecomplex *pC, const doublecomplex a, const int k, const int stepC, const int saveLoc, const int flagisN)
00178 {
00179           double * restrict ptrA = (double *) pA;
00180           double * restrict ptrB = (double *) pB;
00181           double * restrict ptrC = (double *) pC;
00182           double sum00r, sum00i;
00183           int index;
00184           int kEven = k&0xFFFE;
00185 
00186           sum00r = 0.0;
00187           sum00i = 0.0;
00188 
00189           if(k>4) // The loop is safe for k > 4
00190           {
00191         #pragma UNROLL(2)
00192             for(index = 0; index<kEven; index++)
00193             { // loop over k;
00194                   // each iteration performs rank one update of 1x1 by 1x1
00195                   // matrices of A and B respectively; result is
00196                   // accumulated over 1x1 matrix
00197                   double a0r, a0i;
00198                   double b0r, b0i;
00199 
00200                   a0r = *ptrA++;
00201                   a0i = *ptrA++;
00202 
00203                   b0r = *ptrB++;
00204                   b0i = *ptrB++;
00205 
00206                   sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00207                   sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00208                   sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00209                   sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00210 
00211             }
00212             if(k&1) // odd k; one left to do
00213             {
00214                   double a0r, a0i;
00215                   double b0r, b0i;
00216 
00217                   a0r = *ptrA++;
00218                   a0i = *ptrA++;
00219 
00220                   b0r = *ptrB++;
00221                   b0i = *ptrB++;
00222 
00223                   sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00224                   sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00225                   sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00226                   sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00227             }
00228           }
00229           else
00230           {
00231             if(k>0)
00232             { double a0r, a0i;
00233                   double b0r, b0i;
00234 
00235                   a0r = *ptrA++;
00236                   a0i = *ptrA++;
00237 
00238                   b0r = *ptrB++;
00239                   b0i = *ptrB++;
00240 
00241                   sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00242                   sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00243                   sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00244                   sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00245             }
00246             if(k>1)
00247             { double a0r, a0i;
00248                   double b0r, b0i;
00249 
00250                   a0r = *ptrA++;
00251                   a0i = *ptrA++;
00252 
00253                   b0r = *ptrB++;
00254                   b0i = *ptrB++;
00255 
00256                   sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00257                   sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00258                   sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00259                   sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00260             }
00261             if(k>2)
00262             { double a0r, a0i;
00263                   double b0r, b0i;
00264 
00265                   a0r = *ptrA++;
00266                   a0i = *ptrA++;
00267 
00268                   b0r = *ptrB++;
00269                   b0i = *ptrB++;
00270 
00271                   sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00272                   sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00273                   sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00274                   sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00275             }
00276             if(k>3)
00277             { double a0r, a0i;
00278                   double b0r, b0i;
00279 
00280                   a0r = *ptrA++;
00281                   a0i = *ptrA++;
00282 
00283                   b0r = *ptrB++;
00284                   b0i = *ptrB++;
00285 
00286                   sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00287                   sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00288                   sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00289                   sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00290             }
00291 
00292           }
00293 
00294           if(flagisN >= 0){  // final saving Normal and transpose is the same)
00295                         double ar, ai;
00296                         ar = a.r;
00297                         ai = a.i;
00298 
00299                         *ptrC++ = (ar * sum00r - ai * sum00i) + (*ptrC);
00300                         *ptrC   = (ar * sum00i + ai * sum00r) + (*ptrC);
00301           }
00302           else // conjugate form
00303           {
00304                         double ar, ai;
00305                         ar = a.r;
00306                         ai = -a.i;
00307 
00308                         *ptrC++ = (ar * sum00r - ai * sum00i) + (*ptrC);
00309                         *ptrC   = -(ar * sum00i + ai * sum00r) + (*ptrC);
00310           }
00311 
00312 } // zgemmKernelNew()

00315 void zgemmKernelNoReadFlexSave(const doublecomplex *pA, const doublecomplex *pB, doublecomplex *pC, const doublecomplex a, const int k, const int stepC, const int saveLoc, const int flagisN)
00316 {
00317   double * restrict ptrA = (double *) pA;
00318   double * restrict ptrB = (double *) pB;
00319   double * restrict ptrC = (double *) pC;

00326

00328   {

00333           // matrices of A and B respectively; result is

00337 
00338           a0r = *ptrA++;
00339           a0i = *ptrA++;
00340 
00341           b0r = *ptrB++;
00342           b0i = *ptrB++;
00343 
00344           sum00r += a0r*b0r;
00345           sum00r -= a0i*b0i;
00346           sum00i += a0r*b0i;
00347           sum00i += a0i*b0r;
00348 
00349     }
